code:
sequenceDiagram
  participant Client
  participant HTTP as HTTP Handler
  participant Kit
  participant Adapter
  participant Provider

  Client->>HTTP: POST /generate/stream
  HTTP->>Kit: streamGenerate()
  Kit->>Adapter: streamGenerate()
  Adapter->>Provider: stream=true request
  Provider-->>Adapter: SSE chunks
  Adapter-->>Kit: StreamChunk
  Kit-->>HTTP: StreamChunk
  HTTP-->>Client: event: chunk
  HTTP-->>Client: event: done
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
